# Security Policy

We take the security of this repository seriously. If you believe you have found
a security vulnerability in this repository, please report it privately and do
not open a public issue.

## Reporting a vulnerability

Please send a detailed report to:

hass-tailscale@oss.joefang.org (not for support!)

Include a description of the issue, steps to reproduce, and any known impact so
we can triage and respond quickly.
